description:
While heading to Asatsuki Town for Hikari`s next contest, Satoshi and his friends get lost once again in a forest. They see Grandma Wilma`s Altaria` Draco Meteor in the air and quickly go to see where it was coming from.
Grandma Wilma`s Altaria was captured by Rocket Gang and Satoshi and friends rescued it with the help of Fukamaru who managed to use Draco Meteor on the damaged ball that Altaria had previously cracked.
name: Tyltalis (Tatsu Baasan)
